attributes.action: British Muslims support the UK Government against ISIS and Extremism
attributes.additional_details:
Isis is an evil and despicable terrorist organisation that commits mass killings and abductions of members of religious and ethnic minorities, as well as the beheading's of aid workers and journalists.

This outrageous band of criminals do not represent the teachings of Islam and are a stain on humanity. We as British Muslims support the government's stance on responding to ISIS and the threat of extremism both foreign and domestic.
